column5: Going fishing to Lake Kipawa June 24/2000.Staying on Island cottages, near Hunter lake And Turtle lake.need advise on how deep to fish and what to look for in order to have a few walleyes to take back home from the trip. Went last year and did not do so good.(few small eyes.) Also heard there is trout fishing which I have no experience in fishing. Have purchased 2 downriggers and want to try my luck at trout fishing during the afternoon when I can't catch walleyes. Any advise would be appreciated.
